website_summaries.verdict: Nice quality pressure cooker with a traditional design for safe and fast operation.
pros: Lid securely clips in place, ensuring safe operation
Unit includes an aluminum base that gives you a good heat distribution
Unit cooks food more quickly than other options for cooking
6-quart capacity, which will be plenty for most situations you encounter in the kitchen
cons: Shorter unit may not accommodate all jars

customer_reviews.title: The best pressure cook I ever own
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pressure cook I ever bought,I use to cook curry with goat meat every time good quality,delivery fast than I expected,if you want a pressure cook buy this one ,you will love it,highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: That Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Tender meat dishes
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pressure cooker and purchased an electronic one and it did not work well. I love this pressure cooker, the lid goes on easy and keeps an excellent seal. The lid is heavy but I think it keeps it sealed better. All my meals have come out wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: luvfor775

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Cuisinart Stainless Pressure Cooker as a gift for my sister-in-law in Arecibo, Puerto Rico. She's a fantastic cook making all of the Island Delicacies - and she loves her new pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Len Canter

customer_reviews.title: Not able to fry chicken or fish in!
customer_reviews.text: Can be used on electric and gas stoves, easier to use over the Insta Pot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing pressure regulator
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great but we opened it up and the pressure regulator is missing. Because of this we cannot set the different PSI settings.
customer_reviews.author: AHKHAN

customer_reviews.title: Quick dinners
customer_reviews.text: One hour in pressure cooker vs. 8 hours in crock pot. No contest! Good looking and safe. Love the locking lid. Oh and did I mention fast. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Woofy50

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a pressure cooker since I was living with my parents 15 years ago. I should have bought one earlier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y?

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s very useful. It saves a lot of time in the kitchen . It’s top mechanism to lock the top is very intuitive and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I total recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, not to heavy, very easy to manage and works perfect! Excellent quality, I total recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Katia Ortuno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This pressure cooker is very well-made and easy to use. I have had several p.c. over 50 years and this is definitely the best quality. I am especially impressed with how fast it reaches full pressure, which speeds cooking, and with the safety features.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pressure cooker i have used, work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: abdel BOUDRAA

customer_reviews.title: Very good pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for one year, i can’t cook meat and pulses without this, it has decreased cooking time i highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Raza Younis

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!! BAD PRODUCT, BAD SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Within a 2-3 months discoloring began at the bottom. Finally, we contacted the seller, sending them pictures. All we got back was a list of cleaning products to use! Seriously??!! Now I have to go out and spend money on tons of cleaning products due to your faulty product? Either refund or send a replacement! Bad product, bad service.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: This pressure cooker works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast this pressure cooker will cook a meal, and how tender the meat is cooked. A pot of beans cooks fast and tender. The unit is very high quality, simple to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: James Dilport

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product. Handles get overheated though.
customer_reviews.text: Overall gets the job done, and seems pretty safe. What I was disappointed about is that the handles become very hot while cooking, so you can’t grab them with naked hands.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This product is very DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.text: I thought Cuisinart was a great brand until I bought this. It spits HOT water everywhere. The only thing that is good is the cover. I hate it and now I can't send it back.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: The Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest pressure I have ever owned ! I even have the Instant Pit! I love everything about it! Heats up fast! Looks great! Cooks amazing! Love how it opens and closes! I use it all the time! There is NO better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over the old type of locks. So easy and much safer when taking the lid off.
customer_reviews.author: Alan N. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have an Instant Pot that I always thought was like a beginners' Pressure cooker. I have always been interested in pressure cookers, but was a little worried about them. I should not have been. This is amazing and easy to use. The directions are extremely clear about how to set it up and when not to open it. The only thing that was alarming to me was the sound of the steam coming out, but it was a matter of making sure that the steam was steady. I have only used this for chicken soup and for applesauce so far but it is a treat how easy it is to set up, start, and then eat great food.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Cooks in less time and food is delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Best pressure cooker I ever owned and have owned a few. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B

customer_reviews.title: Better Than They Used to Be
customer_reviews.text: No they don't make them like they used to, but this one is actually much better. I am glad to be able to say that. In today's disposable everything world it is nice to see a good quality product that looks like it was made to last. I also like others, find the lid design to be great. So easy to put on and take off. A much better design for sure. Yes, the bottom is thick and foods cook evenly without burning or scorching (most of the time!). Easy to clean. I like this one. It is not really a bad price either for what you are getting. I think it is actually a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Spirits

customer_reviews.title: Very nice traditional pressure pot
customer_reviews.text: A nice old school pressure pot to use on the stove. Nice finish, handle's easy to use, easy pressure relief. Pre-Instapot pressure pot, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Storm the Penguin

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Professional Collection Stainless Pressure cooker, Medium, Silver
product_meta.description: Cook faster with the Cuisinart professional collection stainless steel 6Qt pressure cooker. This pressure cooker will cook up to 70% faster than traditional methods. Toss ingredients in the pot, seal the lid, and let the pressure do the work! you will enjoy healthy results as foods retain more of their natural vitamins and minerals than traditional cooking methods. With faster cooking times, this pressure cooker is energy efficient and consumes less energy than traditional cooking methods. Easily cook a variety of foods from soups, entrees and desserts. Features: One-handle convenience thanks to a secure open and lock lid design|Premium stainless steel offers optimal cooking performance.|Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly eliminating hot spots|Safe and easy pressure Regulation releases steam away from user when optimal pressure is reached High low and quick release pressure settings available|Ergonomic handles provide a secure grip and ensure perfect balance|Dishwasher safe|Lifetime warranty
feature_bullets: Cooks up to 70% faster than traditional methods
Premium stainless steel allows optimal cooking performance & is dishwasher safe
Aluminum encapsulated base allows for superior heat distribution; heating quickly and evenly while eliminating hot spots.Never use harsh chemicals or scouring pad
One-handle convenience. Securely open and lock lid with one-handle design
Safe and easy pressure regulation. The pressure release valve releases steam away when optimal pressure is reached. High, low and quick release pressure settings available
Ergonomic handles provide a secure and balanced grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars76 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
